attributes.action: allow Punch and Judy stalls in the Fair that Gordon Brown wants us all to have.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown promised us last week "A Future Fair For All". This is excellent, as we all enjoyed going to the Fair when we were young, and it'd be lovely to actually have one.

It's only reasonable that the Fair that we've all been promised should reflect society as a whole, and that includes violence in the workplace.

So, can we have a Punch and Judy stall at our Fair?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
